channel.title: Colwich HSO 2025-2026 Calendar üóìÔ∏è on Colwich Home & School Organization
channel.description: Recent content in Colwich HSO 2025-2026 Calendar üóìÔ∏è on Colwich Home & School Organization

item.title: 1st HSO Meeting üóìÔ∏è
item.description: Meet @ The Nest in Colwich Elementary on Sept 11th at 6:30pm to help plan out the fall events, and to fill out volunteer roles. Enter through door 3 on the east side! Hope to see you there!

item.title: 2nd HSO Meeting üóìÔ∏è
item.description: 6:30 meeting at The Gathering Space to help us plan out the winter events, and to fill out volunteer roles. Hope to see you there!

item.title: 3rd HSO Meeting üóìÔ∏è
item.description: Meet in the CES Nest at 6:30 to help us plan out the Spring Events, and to fill out volunteer roles. Hope to see you there!

item.title: 4th HSO Meeting üóìÔ∏è
item.description: Meet at The Keg to help us plan out the next school year. Hope to see you there!

item.title: Barn'rds Spirit Night üéâ
item.description: Mention Colwich Elementary when you grab a meal at Barn’rds in Maize anytime on December 10th. 15% of sales are donated back to HSO!

item.title: Carousel Skate Night üéâ
item.description: Have a fun night out with classmates and familes at Carousel Skate. Make sure to mention Colwich Elementary, and 20% of profits will go back to Colwich HSO. Grade with highest attendance earns pizza party that evening. Winning teacher wins a gift card!

item.title: CES Used Uniform Sale üëï
item.description: Prepare for the new school year with our used uniform sales. Stop by on July 29th and July 30th, from 8am to Noon, to shop used uniforms.

item.title: Coffee With Cardinals ‚òï
item.description: The 2024-25 school year has begun. Take a moment on September 18th, and join us for some coffee & donuts between 7:45am - 8:30am. A chance to meet fellow school families in the old gym and cafeteria.

item.title: Coin Wars ü™ô
item.description: From March 10th through March 14th, classes will compete to raise donations for the school! There are tons of prizes to be won, so check out the rules and rewards below!

item.title: Colwich Christmas Festival üéÑ
item.description: Candy Cane Hunt begins in the park at 5:00. Games, crafts, treats and more to follow at CES North Gym! Visit with Santa from 5:30 - 6:30!

item.title: Conference Meals üçΩÔ∏è
item.description: HSO supplies one meal for each teacher conference throughout the year. Contact us if you would like to donate any tasty goodies along with the meal.

item.title: Dessert Social üç™
item.description: Back to School night! We hope to see you on August 18th between 6:00pm-7:00pm. Stop by after meeting your teachers to enjoy dessert with the community.

item.title: Gambino's Spirit Night üéâ
item.description: Mention Colwich Elementary when you grab a meal at Gambino’s Original in Colwich, or use online code Colwich2024, anytime on Septmber 10th. A portion of sales are donated back to HSO!

item.title: Spirit Night üéâ
item.description: Eat at Chick-Fil-A and mention “Spirit Night” at the register any time between 3pm-10pm on September 25th, and 20% of sales will go back to HSO! Use the code “community” for mobile orders.

item.title: Teacher Appreciation üòç
item.description: A few times a year, we stock up the teachers supply cart with new goodies. Contact us if you would like to add something as a show of appreciation.

item.title: Teacher Appreciation üòç
item.description: A few times a year, we stock up the teachers supply cart with new goodies. Contact us if you would like to add something as a show of appreciation.

item.title: Teacher Appreciation Week üíñ
item.description: During the week of May 5th, we show teachers our appreciation and gratitude in a variety of ways!

item.title: Teacher Conference Meals üçΩÔ∏è
item.description: HSO supplies one meal for each teacher conference throughout the year. Contact us if you would like to donate any tasty goodies along with the meal.

item.title: Trunk or Treat üéÉ
item.description: Each year, the Colwich Library puts on a Trunk or Treat event. HSO participates with a decorated trunk. Stop on by from 7:00pm to 8:00pm to enjoy some candy with the community!

item.title: Veterans Day Reception üéñÔ∏è
item.description: Join CES to honor our Veterans on November 11th at 10am. After the ceremony, HSO will provide food and drink for a light reception.

item.title: Winter Market ‚ùÑÔ∏è
item.description: Come and join us in the CES North Gym on Saturday, November 15th from 10:00am to 3:00pm for a Winter Market Wonderland! You can find unique gifts, support local shops, find hand crafted items, and grab a bite at the bake sale.
